email.description: The email address of the user.

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template used in the push open event.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the push open event occurred.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.

actionIdentifier.description: The identifier of the action taken by the user.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message.

sentAt.description: The timestamp when the push notification was sent.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign associated with the push open event.
